desc: Welcome to the knife you’ve been looking for - extreme cutting power with no rust, ever. Boye Cobalt Blades with bonded carbides hold an edge up to 100X longer than steel and sharpen fast. Designed by master knife maker David Boye. Made in USA since 1971.

layout.text: TAKE THE STRUGGLE OUT OF CUTTING!

HIGH PERFORMANCE, RUSTPROOF SALT WATER SAFETY KNIVES
HANDCRAFTED IN THE USA
